did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Artwork, architectural plans, manuscript, and notebooks.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Portfolio of artwork including student sketches and drawings made before he entered Cornell; twenty-six student architectural drawings by Hubbell and others for an alumni hall (never built) at Cornell University; and three notebooks, 1890-1891, including physics lectures by Prof. Edward L. Nichols.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Portfolio of artwork including student sketches and drawings made before he entered Cornell; twenty-six student architectural drawings by Hubbell and others for an alumni hall (never built) at Cornell University; and three notebooks, 1890-1891, including physics lectures by Prof. Edward L. Nichols.
Essay written by Hubbell entitled "The New Athletic Field," ie. Percy Field.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Benjamin S. Hubbell papers, #37-5-1917. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
